info.name: Vimeo Blackout v1.3
info.description:
Works on Chrome and Firefox AFAIK. 
Little testing but if anything doesn't work right for you or you edit the style so that others would like, leave a comment.
 A clean dark theme that makes it less distracting and easier to focus on the juicy content!
No Ads, less clutter, more time to just enjoy!
 
 *Now with experimental scroll bar ((GOOGLE CHROME ONLY)) Now with experimental scroll bar*

A recommended extension would be https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/khpcanbeojalbkpgpmjpdkjnkfcgfkhb
it's an extremely good smooth scrolling extension for Chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
*Change log
1.3 --- 28/7/12 

- *New* Experimental scroll bar for Chrome. Really hope Firefox/IE/Opera start supporting this feature. 
- background image for the bottom of the page. Doesn't seem to expose so much of the gradient as the last. Nav menu is now readable. 
- Fade out on hover the <video> player . (currently fades even when hovering on the info, practical. But still not what I want)

1.2 - 25/7/12 - Using dates from now on... Works with Firefox now, properly.

1.1 - Vastly improved the text and general feel of navigating. *Bugs - Firefox likes to be different.

1.0 - Partially completed. Working for most of the  website.

0.3 - Re-enabled the section .blocks.

0.2 - Added gradients and sexy backgrounds. Changed a few other colours as well.

0.1 - Initial changes were fixing the old dark theme on US
